title: Merry Christmas!
desc: The Phantom Thieves have gathered for a Christmas party. Shun has even said he'll make something, but...

title: Virtual New Year's Underway
desc: Harvest World Online is hosting a comeback event for the holidays. Yui has been complaining about the proceedings, but it seems there will be some big changes this year...

title: Gifts for Always Doing Your Best
desc: Kotone is worried about how busy Tomoko is dealing with the holiday rush at her job at the drugstore. We decided to go buy Tomoko some gifts...

title: New Year's with the Miyashita Family
desc: As I was doing some year-end shopping, I bumped into Minami. It seems like Minami's store is busy with stocking up for customers buying things for their first shrine visits of the year...

title: Happy New Year
desc: A month has passed since the new year began, and the New Year's atmosphere has completely died down. Just then, Yaoling came by to give me "New Year's greetings..."

title: Lunar New Year Greetings
desc: To celevrate Lunar New Year, I decided to go around my neighborhood with Yaoling. Although we couldn't visit Tomiyama since she was travelling, we were able to go to the Miyashita family's izakaya. Minami also showed interest in Lunar New Year...

title: Chinatown Celebrations
desc: Yaoling, Minami, and I decided to visit Chinatown, which should be busting with life Lunar New Year. Despite the beautiful decorations, however, people there don't seem to be very festive...

title: Hero Show
desc: A hero show was taking place at a nearby park in Chinatown. We spotted Kamiyama, who's trying to become a costumed stuntman...

title: City of Stolen Desire
desc: Lufel suspects that desires are being stolen from Chinatown. We decide to use the Metaverse Navigator and test his theory by checking out the situation in the Metaverse...
targetText2: Clear with everyone's HP 50% or higher

title: Anomalies in Mementos
desc: The Shadows in Mementos are acting strange. Defeat the oncoming Shadows!
targetText2: Clear with everyone's HP 50% or higher

title: Return to Chinatown
desc:
We're running out of time.
We should defeat the Shadows and get back to everyone...
targetText2: Clear with only Fire or Bless party members
targetText3: At the end of battle, have no allies inflicted with spiritual ailments

title: Shiina's Testimony
desc: There's definitely been a decrease in the number of people at the festival. From talking to Shiina, who has been selling limited-edition Lunar New Year drinks at the venue, it sounds like the festival stalls have been really quiet this year...

title: Save the Lion Dance
desc: The event staff arrived in a panic, announcing the cancellation of the lion dance performance. Yaoling emphasized the importance of the dance for Lunar New Year, and even offered to perform, but...
targetText2: Clear with everyone's HP 50% or higher
targetText3: Use 3 or more Fire skills during battle

title: Head to Mementos
desc: Lufel continues to suspect that the reason for everyone's stolen desire lies in Mementos. We need to defeat Shadows and find the true cause.
targetText2: Clear with everyone's HP 50% or higher
targetText3: Use 1 or more Fire skill during battle

title: Defeat the Shadow
desc: I should get back to everyone after defeating the Shadows.
targetText2: Clear without a Saboteur party member
targetText3: Use 2 or more Highlights during battle

title: Enjoy Lunar New Year
desc: Kamiyama offers to take Yaoling's place, as the lion proves to be heavier than she can handle. The staff asks for our help for the performance, as well...

title: To the Depths of Mementos
desc: It seems the cause of everything is not in the real version of Chinatown. Let's head deeper into Mementos and continue our investigation.
targetText2: Clear without a Strategist party member
targetText3: Deal technical damage 1 or more times during battle

title: The True Cause...
desc:
We encountered a strangely upbeat Shadow in Mementos.
From what we heard, it seems this "strange Shadow" is causing some trouble...
targetText2: Clear with everyone's HP 50% or higher
targetText3: Deal weakness damage 4 or more times during battle

title: Nian
desc:
This "Yearbeast" seems to be the one stealing desires of people wanting to enjoy the festival.
Let's defeat the Yearbeast and reclaim everyone's desire!
targetText3: Use 1 or more normal attacks during battle

title: Pacify the Nian
desc: In the middle of battle, the Yearbeast suddenly changed colors. It seems like this isn't going to be an easy fight...
targetText3: At the end of battle, have no allies inflicted with elemental ailments

title: Defeat the Nian
desc: The Yearbeast continues its rampage. Cattle tries to put an end to things with his Persona, but...
targetText3: At the end of battle, have no allies inflicted with spiritual ailments

title: Reclaim your Lunar Desire
desc:
The Year Beast is showing signs of fatigue.
This is our chance. Let's reclaim their Lunar New Year Desires!
targetText3: Use 1 or more 1 More during battle

title: Clad in Crimson
desc: Coming back from Mementos, Yaoling greets me dressed in a stunning Lunar New Year outfit...

title: A Big Success
desc:
The lion dance performance was a huge hit.
Let's all have a celebration at Shiina's stall.

title: The Way Back
desc: As the festival comes to a close, we decide to part ways with Yaoling at Yongen-Jaya. On the way back, Yaoling speaks openly about her thoughts on the Lunar New Year festival that we all spent together...

title: The Holidays with Big Bro
desc: Miyu has come to say goodbye to the New Year. It seems she's going to be doing a marionette show at theme park's New Year's event...

title: After Year-End Cleaning
desc: A bump into Tomiyama and Leo after finishing my year-end cleaning turned into a surprise inspection from Tomiyama to make sure I had cleaned everything properly...

title: New Year's Eve
desc: The Phantom Thieves gather to celebrate New Year's. After enjoying some handmade soba noodles, they reflect on the year that is to come...

title: Wishes for the Year's First Shrine Visit
desc: During their first shrine visit of the new year, the Phantom Thieves talked about the wishes they made. But then...

title: Japanese New Year's
desc: Yaoling and Yukimi visit to give well-wishes for the new year. It seems that Yukimi has taught Yaoling a lot about a "Japanese" New Year's...

title: Seeking the Holy Grail
desc: While out shopping by Shibuya Station during the holidays, I bump into Kurotani, who is on a quest to find "a holy grail of sweetness desired by the gods." But then, Haruna also shows up...
